eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Lake; Mason; Oceana, MI; at 09:47 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 10:47 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
This is a test of the Emergency Alert System, originating from the Michigan State Police State Emergency Operations Center in Lansing.

If this had been an actual emergency, such as a tornado, toxic material release, nuclear plant incident, widespread phone or power outages, or other state or local emergency that affects your safety, official messages would have followed the alert tone.

This concludes this test of the Emergency Alert System.
